description: Trait that represents an update event for a pitch to a platform. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.
title: Platform pitch event

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___user_id.description: The ID of the user who made this update.

___status.description: The current status of the pitch.

___note.description: Optional note associated with this update.
